#labels Phase-Requirements
User stories for the Whisper IM project

=Week 1=
<ul><li>User can chat securely without error messages (Chris, Cory, Nick)<ul><li>1/16: Encryptor class has been fixed, code cleanup still in progress</li></ul></li><li>User becomes idle after set amount of inactivity (Kirk, John) <ul><li>1/15: developed skeleton code for IdleListener class</li></ul></li></ul>


=Future=
  * User can select buddy by left click and then  toggle block status using a button on   toolbar
  * User can set status to "Away"
  * User can enable/disable logging
  * User can share public key information with other users
  * User will see updated buddy list when other users sign in or out
  * User is displayed account setup screen when starting program for first time
  * User can initiate talk with anyone regardless of "buddy" status
  * User can select "New IM" and be displayed a new window without selecting a buddy
  * User can utilize rich text in conversation
  * User can utilize the enter key in place of clicking the send button
  * User can utilize the enter key in place of clicking the login button
